content.text:
# Endorsements in the 1928 Republican Party presidential primaries

This is a list of endorsements for declared candidates in the Republican primaries for the 1928 United States presidential election.
Herbert Hoover
* Curtis Wilbur, U.S. Secretary of the Navy (1924–1929)
* Hubert Work, U.S. Secretary of the Interior (1923–1928)
* Theodore Douglas Robinson, Assistant Secretary of the Navy (1924–1929)
* Mabel Walker Willebrandt, U.S. Assistant Attorney General (1921–1929)
* Seymour Lowman, Assistant U.S. Secretary of the Treasury (1927–1932)
* Walter Folger Brown, Assistant U.S. Secretary of Commerce (1927–1929)
* Ogden L. Mills, U.S. Under Secretary of the Treasury (1927–1932)
;:Former
* George Wickersham, U.S. Attorney General (1909–1913)
* Theodore Roosevelt Jr., U.S. Assistant Secretary of the Navy (1921–1924)
* James Garfield, U.S. Secretary of the Interior (1907–1909)
* Claudius H. Huston, Assistant U.S. Secretary of Commerce
* Foster Bain, Director of the U.S. Bureau of Mines (1921–1924)
